body:
Ulrike and I both had the same build fail on our LLNL linux boxes.
There's apparently something wrong with our libstdc++, 

/tmp/schroder2/spack-stage/spack-stage-uSRhcV/cmake-3.9.4/Bootstrap.cmk/cmake: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by /tmp/schroder2/spack-stage/spack-stage-uSRhcV/cmake-3.9.4/Bootstrap.cmk/cmake)
---------------------------------------------
Error when bootstrapping CMake:
Problem while running initial CMake
---------------------------------------------

For more details, I've attached the spack-build.out below.

Any help or comments would be much appreciated.

Thanks,

Jacob

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1395620/spack-build.out.txt)
title: Error when bootstrapping CMake: build fail on LLNL linux box
